insert into crew values (#{crewId}, #{user.userId}, #{crewContact}, #{crewName}, #{crewBirth}, #{carType}, #{carNumber})
mapper.select: select u.email as email, u.password as password, c.crew_contact as crew_contact, c.crew_name as crew_name, c.crew_birth as crew_birth, c.car_type as car_type, c.car_number as car_number from crew c join users u on c.user_id = u.user_id where c.crew_id = #{crewId}
mapper.update: update crew set crew_contact = #{crewContact}, password = #{password}, car_type = #{carType}, car_number = #{carNumber} where crew_id = #{crewId}
